page.title: 08LEITH'S FUTURE
page.content: A Redevelopment aims to encourage investment, industrial growth and the improved appearance of Leith. This is best shown by landscaping and the conservationn of the Leith walkways. House building by both sectors has been given priority as long as their designs are sympathetic to the surrounding area. All agencies must conform with set regulations governing density and recreational ground. Industry and commerce have not been ignored. Both are being safeguarded; growth is being encouraged and Leith Docks are being developed for port related industries. Conservation is another priority. Leith has 270 listed buildings and their historical and architectural character must not be impaired. There are 28 sites to be developed and the 10 year plan is now half completed.
